HAS_BLED_AGE_TXT: Please choose an apropriate age interval
HAS_BLED_HYPERTENSION_HISTORY_TXT: Please indicate if the patient suffers from hypertension.
HAS_BLED_RENAL_DISEASE_TXT: Please indicate if the patient suffers from any renal disease.
HAS_BLED_LIVER_DISEASE_TXT: Please indicate if the patient suffers from any liver disease.
HAS_BLED_STROKE_OR_TIA_OR_THROMBOEMBOLIS: Please indicate if the patient has any Stroke, TIA or Thromboembolism history.
HAS_BLED_LABILE_INR_TXT: Please indicate if the patient has a labil, unstable or augmented INR
HAS_BLED_ANTIPLATELET_OR_NSAIDS_TXT: Please indicate if there is usage of anti-platelet or NSAIDs
HAS_BLED_ALCOOL_OR_DRUG_USAGE_HISTORY_TX: Please indicate if there is a history of alcool or drug usage
HAS_BLED_LEGEND: Anual Risk of Haemorrhage under Oral Hipocoagulation; HAS-BLED Score
HAS_BLED_SCORE_LEGEND: H - Hypertension [+1]; A - Abnormal Renal Function / Abnormal Liver Function [+1/+1]; S - Stroke [+1]; B - Bleeding [+1]; L - Labile INR [+1]; E - Elderly [+1]; D - Alcohol or Drug Usage / Antiplatelet or NSAIDs [+1/+1]
HAS_BLED_ANUAL_RISK_LABEL: Anual Risk of Haemorrhage under Oral Hipocoagulation
HAS_BLED_ANUAL_RISK_LEGEND: Risk of Intra-Cranial Hemorrhage; Hospitalization; Decreased Hemoglobin and / or Transfusion
